content: mark – DDR4 DRAM with on chip power regulation: N+1 voltage regulators – Standard Open Memory Interface (OMI); up to 6 OMI per drawer: • CRC/Retry for soft errors • Degrade bus lanes 4 → 2 on hard error • No waiting for all eight cards (use first seven to respond)  Concurrent service and upgrade by way of Concurrent Drawer Repair (CDR) 2.6.2 General IBM z16 A01 RAS features The IBM z16 A01 server includes the following RAS features:  The IBM z16 A01 server provides a true N+1 pumps and N+1 fans for the cooling function.  The Power/Thermal Subsystem is continued from IBM z15 T01 to IBM z16 A01. It uses switchable, intelligent Power Distribution Units (PDUs), or Bulk Power Assemblies.  Redundant (N+1), number of PDUs (up to four pairs, configuration dependent) or BPAs (also configuration-dependent - 2 or 4)  CPC drawer is packaged to fit in the 19-inch frame. CPC drawer power and cooling includes the following components: – PSUs: AC to 12 V bulk/standby (N+1 redundant). The PSU FRU
